title: Clean & Clear Advantage Acne Control Kit
Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions 3 Step Regimen Kit
description: Put your best face forward with the Burt’s Bees® Natural Acne Solutions Regimen Kit. This kit contains acne products for cleansing, moisturizing and targeting blemishes in a 3-step acne regimen: a 5 fluid ounce bottle of Purifying Gel Cleanser, a 2 fluid ounce bottle of Daily Moisturizing Lotion and a 0.26 fluid ounce tube of Targeted Spot Treatment. Each natural acne treatment in this acne kit contains salicylic acid, derived naturally from willow bark extract, to penetrate clogged pores and help reduce acne and prevent future breakouts. All of the Burt’s Bees® Natural Acne Solutions products are dermatologist tested, noncomedogenic and non-irritating. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt’s Bees.

title: Bdellium Tools Professional Makeup Brush Green Bambu Series with Vegan Synthetic Bristles - Eye Liner 710
description: Line the eyes using this extra fine narrow pointed brush. Use with liquid or cream products. Bdellium Tools Green Bambu series brushes are professional eco-friendly makeup brushes with all sustainable bamboo handle and all vegan soft synthetic bristles with an anodized aluminum ferrule. Bamboo is one of the most sustainable resources and environmentally sound plants on Earth. Due to its rapid re-growth cycle, it can be harvested with virtually no impact on the environment. All of the soft synthetic filaments used in the Green Bambu series are not treated with an antibacterial agent. The advantages of synthetic bristles includes less or no hair shedding compared to natural bristles, it is easier to clean and provides a light application. The synthetic bristles are hypoallergenic and 100% cruelty-free.

title: L'Oreal Paris EverCreme Sulfate-Free Moisture System Cleansing Conditioner, 8.3 Fluid Ounce
description: Evercreme is the first sulfate-free moisture lock system that delivers lush 48-hour hydration without heavy coating waxes. Rich in natural omega 3-9.

title: Bdellium Tools Amazon Exclusive Professional Makeup Brush - Duet Fiber Finishing Brush 955
description: This brush is designed to create the perfect light finish with the versatility of being able to blend face powder or water-based foundation beautifully. The brush also features a tapered handle for easier storage in makeup brush belts. Having two levels of bristles provides the versatility of being able to layer product beautifully onto skin. Features ferrule made from anodized aluminum, black handle, and purple bristles. This is an Amazon Exclusive brush from Bdellium Tools available for a limited time only.

title: Sigma Spa ® Brush Cleaning Glove Aqua
description:
The Sigma Beauty Sigma Spa Brush Cleaning Glove was specially designed as a quick, easy and effective method to deep clean your makeup brush collection. The revolutionary device offers a variety of necessary textures and surfaces for removing all makeup from brushes while using only a small amount of cleaning solution. The dual-sided glove provides a complete cleaning process for both eye and face brushes. Patent pending.

Brush Cleaning How-To:
1. WASH - Add a small amount of cleaning solution and water to glove and swirl brush on 'Wash' texture to begin deep cleaning the brush(es).
2. RINSE - Place brush under running water and sweep brush back and forth on the 'Rinse' texture of the glove to remove makeup residue & soap.
3. REFINE - Swirl brush on the 'Refine' texture of the glove for an added deep cleaning
4. RINSE - Place brush under running water & sweep brush back and forth on the 'Rinse' texture for a final rinse.
5. SHAPE - Reshape brush bristles by placing brush head on the 'Shape' section of the glove while squeezing with your hand to remove excess water.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: 100% Raw Unrefined Organic Shea Butter - FREE Body Butter Recipes eBook - Best Organic African Grade A Yellow - Pure and Natural for Use on Skin and Hair - Rich in Vitamins A & E - Use on Acne, Eczema, Stretch Marks, Rashes - Use As Belly Butter To Keep Mommy's Skin Soft And Supple, More Natural Than Popular Brand-Name Butters - Essential Ingredient for DIY Body Butters, Lotions, Soaps and Other Natural Skincare Recipes - 1LB (16oz)
description:
HEADLINEIs YELLOW Shea Butter Real Shea Butter? Oh Yes Indeed!Take the Ivory Shea Butter, add a root from the African Borututu Tree, and you have your Yellow Shea Butter. Simple!Our Yellow and Ivory Shea Butter are both Grade A, unrefined and organic, and are made by the same women and area in Ghana, performing the same amazing results for the user, and choosing one color over the other is a matter of personal preference.SUB-HEADLINE: Describe the ProblemWhy YELLOW Shea Butter?1. The consistency is harder than the Ivory Shea Butter and when applied to the skin takes a little longer to absorb. This is great news for very dry skin and eczema because it takes its time to penetrate the skin layers and keeps your skin moisturized longer.2. Yellow Shea Butter evens out skin tone and produces a very slight tan look in users with lighter skin. 

Clinical studies have shown that Unrefined Shea Butter transforms the skin in as little as 4-6 weeks, into a softer, smoother, and better looking skin and it is truly applicable to many skin conditions. Raw Shea Butter is used alone or in combination with other natural ingredients, such as butters, oils and essences. Shea Butter is non-comedogenic (does not clog pores) so it is successfully used to naturally relieve acne.SUB-HEADLINE: Describe the ProblemOrder your 1LB of High Quality, Raw Shea Butter and start reaping its great benefits now!
